about.title: About Apex Strategy Group
about.body: Founded in 2012, Apex Strategy Group has helped over 200 companies achieve breakthrough performance. Our team of former Fortune 500 executives and McKinsey alumni brings deep industry expertise and practical experience to every engagement. We don't just provide recommendations‚Äîwe partner with you to drive implementation and deliver results.
about.subtitle: Why clients choose us

caseStudies.title: Case Studies
caseStudies.subtitle: Deep dives into our methodology and results

items.title: From $10M to $35M: SaaS Growth Transformation
items.challenge: TechScale had plateaued at $10M ARR with high churn and inefficient go-to-market. The board was pressuring for growth before the next funding round.
items.solution: We implemented a comprehensive growth strategy: redesigned pricing and packaging, rebuilt the sales process, launched a customer success function, and expanded into two new verticals. We worked hands-on with their team for 6 months.
results: Deal sizes increased 3.2x through new packaging

testimonial.text: Apex didn't just give us a strategy deck‚Äîthey rolled up their sleeves and made it happen with us. The results speak for themselves.
testimonial.author: Jennifer Park
testimonial.title: CEO, TechScale

items.title: Digital Transformation Saves Manufacturer $4.2M Annually
items.challenge: A 50-year-old manufacturer was losing ground to competitors with higher margins, faster production, and lower defect rates. Manual processes and legacy systems were holding them back.
items.solution: We led a comprehensive digital transformation: automated production planning, implemented IoT sensors for predictive maintenance, digitized quality control, and trained the workforce on new systems.

testimonial.text: We thought digital transformation was for tech companies. Apex showed us how to modernize while respecting our culture and people.
testimonial.author: Robert Chen
testimonial.title: COO, Legacy Manufacturing

items.title: Retail Chain Expansion: 12 to 47 Locations in 2 Years
items.challenge: Successful 12-location healthy fast-casual chain wanted to scale but lacked systems, processes, and capital strategy for rapid growth.
items.solution: We developed a comprehensive scaling strategy: standardized operations playbook, real estate site selection model, franchise vs. company-owned analysis, and helped secure growth capital. We also recruited key executives.
results: Expanded from 12 to 47 locations in 24 months

testimonial.text: Apex gave us the roadmap and expertise to scale without losing quality. They understood both the strategic and operational challenges.
testimonial.author: Maria Gonzalez
testimonial.title: Founder & CEO, FreshBowl

items.text: Apex Strategy Group transformed our business. Their insights were spot-on, and more importantly, they stayed with us through implementation. We achieved a 3x return on our investment in the first year alone.
items.author: David Martinez

items.text: We've worked with multiple consulting firms, and Apex stands apart. They combine Big 3 methodology with startup speed and founder empathy. Highly recommend for any growing company.
items.author: Sarah Johnson

items.text: The operational improvements Apex helped us implement saved our company over $4M annually. They paid for themselves many times over. True partners in every sense.
items.author: Robert Chen

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Former Big 3 consultants and Fortune 500 executives

members.name: Michael Stevens
members.title: Managing Partner & CEO
members.bio: Former McKinsey Senior Partner with 20 years advising Fortune 500 CEOs. Michael specializes in growth strategy, M&A, and digital transformation. MBA from Harvard Business School.

members.name: Jennifer Park
members.title: Partner, Operations
members.bio: Former VP of Operations at Amazon and Bain consultant. Jennifer leads operational excellence engagements across manufacturing, retail, and logistics. MIT Engineering background.

members.name: David Thompson
members.title: Partner, Financial Advisory
members.bio: Former Fortune 500 CFO and BCG consultant. David brings 25 years of financial leadership experience to help clients optimize capital structure, fundraising, and financial operations.

members.name: Lisa Rodriguez
members.title: Partner, People & Culture
members.bio: Former Chief People Officer at Google and organizational psychologist. Lisa helps clients build high-performing teams, develop leaders, and create winning cultures.

steps.title: Discovery & Diagnosis
steps.description: Deep dive into your business through stakeholder interviews, data analysis, and market research to understand root causes and opportunities.

steps.title: Strategy Development
steps.description: Develop data-driven recommendations and strategic roadmap with input from your team. Test assumptions and build financial models.

steps.title: Collaborative Refinement
steps.description: Present findings and work with your leadership team to refine the strategy, align on priorities, and build buy-in.

steps.title: Implementation Support
steps.description: Work side-by-side with your team to execute the strategy, overcome obstacles, and adjust course as needed.

steps.title: Measurement & Optimization
steps.description: Track KPIs, measure impact, and continuously optimize for maximum results. Ensure sustainability after engagement ends.

contact.title: Start Your Transformation
contact.subtitle: Free 60-minute strategy consultation
contact.address: 1200 Executive Tower, Suite 3500, New York, NY 10022

items.question: What makes Apex different from other consulting firms?
items.answer: We combine Big 3 methodology with hands-on implementation support. Unlike traditional consultants who deliver recommendations and leave, we stay with you to drive results. Our team includes former McKinsey, Bain, and BCG consultants plus Fortune 500 executives.

items.question: What is your typical engagement length?
items.answer: Most engagements run 8-16 weeks, though some are shorter (strategy sprints) or longer (transformation programs). We tailor the timeline to your needs and can work on retainer for ongoing support.

items.question: Do you work with startups or just established companies?
items.answer: We work with companies from Series A startups to Fortune 500s. Our sweet spot is growth-stage companies ($5M-$500M revenue) that need senior-level expertise without the overhead of full-time executives.

items.question: How do you charge for your services?
items.answer: We typically work on fixed-fee project engagements or monthly retainers. For some growth engagements, we're open to performance-based fees. We'll discuss pricing during your consultation based on scope and objectives.

items.question: Can you provide references?
items.answer: Absolutely. We're happy to connect you with past clients in your industry who can speak to their experience working with us and the results achieved.

items.question: Do you sign NDAs?
items.answer: Yes, we sign NDAs and have strict confidentiality protocols. Many of our clients are working on sensitive strategic initiatives, and we take data security seriously.

items.question: What if we're not satisfied with the work?
items.answer: We have a satisfaction guarantee. If you're not satisfied within the first 2 weeks, we'll make it right or part ways amicably. In 11 years, we've never had a client invoke this‚Äîour 92% retention rate speaks for itself.

items.question: Do you implement or just provide recommendations?
items.answer: Both! Unlike traditional consultants, we provide hands-on implementation support. We work alongside your team to ensure the strategy becomes reality and delivers results.
